This particular config typically goes for $1,650, which means you’re getting a straight-up $350 discount on it right now. We saw the RTX 5060 variant of this notebook drop to $1,050 a couple of days ago, which has since jumped back up in price, but this is the first time we’re seeing this one with an RTX 5070 drop this low. Amazon currently has this laptop listed for $1,450, so you might want to cash in on this deal at Best Buy to lock the best price before it climbs back to full price. Buy for $37 (Reg. $60)

What we love

If there’s some gear around your house that you’d like to control with infrared or would simply like to tap into more of Aqara’s portfolio of smart home device, this hub is here to help. I personally picked one of these up last year to control my wall mounted fireplace that relies on infrared to be toggled on and off. With it, I was able to set up a Siri Shortcut to turn it on and off. The hub has also allowed me to adopt more Aqara devices that require its hub for HomeKit integration.

items.title: Roundup: White-collar unemployment hits record in Finland
items.summary: HELSINKI, Sept. 26 (Xinhua) -- White-collar unemployment in Finland has surged to a record high, underscoring strains in the labour market as overall joblessness climbed above 10 percent, the highest since 2009, according to official data and union officials. Read full story

Among the other three offers, we’re seeing EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro 3 Portable Power Station bundled with two 220W solar panels for $2,999 shipped, with the closest bundle at Amazon being with a single 400W panel that sits $100 lower. This bundle would normally run you $3,699 at full price, with discounts up until this sale only having seen it go as low as $3,099. Amongst the massive lineup of deals, we spotted Anker’s new SOLIX F3000 Portable Power Station with a FREE protective cover ($99 value) dropping to $1,449 shipped right now, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $50 that doesn’t come with any cover. It’s been carrying a $2,599 full price since hitting the market in June, which we’ve seen drop as low as $1,599 until today, which was the one-time rate seen during July’s Prime Day event. Now the costs are going lower than ever, as you score $1,249 in savings at a new all-time low price. items.summary:
ESR 15W Qi2 3-in-1 charging station

Buy for $13 (Reg. $40)

What we love

You’ll come across plenty of Qi2-certified chargers on the market – including some of the newer 25W Qi2.2 options – but it’s rare to find one priced at just $13. That makes this one of the most budget-friendly Qi2 chargers we’ve turned the spotlight on. It packs a 15W Qi2 wireless charging pad with MagSafe support for your iPhone, plus dedicated spots for both your Apple Watch and AirPods. All in all, a solid charging station for Apple users looking to save a few bucks.

All things considered, the S25 Edge actually has the edge in some respects on Apple’s ultra-thin new phone – it was really just the expensive price tag on the S25 Edge that turned most Android users off.
